sentence: The primary is divided among four Democrats: Congressman Conor Lamb, who won an intensely fought race for a swingy district in the western part of the state in 2018; Lieutenant Governor John Fetterman, a six-foot-nine Democrat aligned with the progressive wing of the party; state Representative Malcolm Kenyatta, another progressive who is the only Black candidate in the primary; and Dr. Val Arkoosh, the chair of the Montgomery county commission—a crucial Philadelphia suburb.
author: Daniel Strauss
title: Democrats Can Win the Pennsylvania Senate Seat—if They Don’t Slaughter One Another First

author: Jennifer Sheehan
title: Muhlenberg College to host first Pennsylvania Senate Democratic debate; John Fetterman still 'under discussion' to attend

author: Hanna Trudo
title: Is Fetterman pulling away in the Pennsylvania Senate race?

author: Dave Boyer
title: Front-runner John Fetterman skips Pennsylvania Senate debate while rivals attack

author: Patrick Reilly
title: Trump gives Dr. Oz ‘complete and total endorsement’ in wide-open PA Senate race

sentence: On the Democratic side, Pennsylvania's progressive lieutenant governor, John Fetterman, is locked in a race against Congressman Conor Lamb, a moderate representing the northwestern suburbs of Pittsburgh.
title: Trump delivers prized endorsement to 'brilliant' Dr Oz in Pennsylvania Senate race - even though the TV surgeon once told the former president to lose weight

sentence: “I believe that the vote was misguided, and that is something that I would never be a part of.” John Fetterman says he was “dismayed” by the Squad’s opposition of Iron Dome funding for Israel — and adds other choice words for the left wing of his party.
author: Michael Ginsberg
title: Pennsylvania Lt. Gov. John Fetterman Calls Out ‘Misguided’ ‘Squad’ For Anti-Israel Vote

sentence: According to a new Franklin & Marshall College Poll: John Fetterman has increased his advantage in the Democratic US Senate primary since March–Fetterman now leads Conor Lamb, 41% to 17%, with one in four (26%) still undecided about their preference.
author: Jason Easley
title: John Fetterman’s Support Grows 13 Points In A Month In PA Senate Primary

author: Stephen Robinson
title: PA Senate Candidate John Fetterman Leading Race To Convince Voters He’s Better Than Dr. Oz
Contentious Pennsylvania race could decide US Senate balance

sentence: PA Lt. Gov John Fetterman (who is running for US Senate) looks thrilled to be at the Easter Egg Roll.
author: Matt Vespa
title: Democrats Appear to Be Testing Progressive Populism In PA Senate Race
